channel.title: Spectaculars September Issues 1-4
channel.description:
![0496fb27c4899785cd3f6ba4c01e6ed7_original|690x388](upload://ifzF5tSXJHbmDFKjJ4R1XZz9fdF.jpeg)
Spectaculars is an episodic super-hero game by Scratchpad Publishing. It explicitly supports drop-in play and quick characters. During the course of a Spectaculars campaign, it's possible to essentially create several series of comics---street level, magical, Fantastic Four-ish, and Cosmic adventures. This will be continuing from previous games, building up a world and background to our comics imprint.
We'll be choosing which of the 4 comics we want to go with each sessions and people can use their old characters or bring in new ones.
We will be using the X-Card and will be playing in accordance with the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
This session is scheduled for 3.5 hours and will be recorded. 5 players
[date=2019-09-07 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-09-07 time=14:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"][Issue 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LjWlZGZSPQLkpKYl2xf) [date=2019-09-14 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-09-14 time=14:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"][Issue 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LjWlkmY2gudU3LTaQtI) [date=2019-09-21 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-09-21 time=14:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"][Issue 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LjWlZGZSPQLkpKYl2xf) [date=2019-09-28 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-09-28 time=14:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"][Issue 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LjWlkmY2gudU3LTaQtI)

item.title: Spectaculars September Issues 1-4
item.dc:creator: @Mikel_Matthews
item.description:
@Mikel_Matthews wrote:

0496fb27c4899785cd3f6ba4c01e6ed7_original1552×873 403 KB

Spectaculars is an episodic super-hero game by Scratchpad Publishing. It explicitly supports drop-in play and quick characters. During the course of a Spectaculars campaign, it’s possible to essentially create several series of comics—street level, magical, Fantastic Four-ish, and Cosmic adventures. This will be continuing from previous games, building up a world and background to our comics imprint.

We’ll be choosing which of the 4 comics we want to go with each sessions and people can use their old characters or bring in new ones.

We will be using the X-Card and will be playing in accordance with the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.

This session is scheduled for 3.5 hours and will be recorded. 5 players
